channel.title: dplyr on r-econometrics
channel.description: Recent content in dplyr on r-econometrics

item.title: Introduction to dplyr
item.description: The cleaning and transformation of data belong to the most time consuming parts of any economic analysis. Many graphical or statistical functions in R require specifically formated data to work properly. Although the standard functions of R can be used to prepare your data for further analysis, some people find them a bit labourious for daily applications. Therefore, alternatives have been developed, which make data transformation in R easier and also faster.
